titles.title: District of Columbia Retirement Equality Act of 2000

To amend the District of Columbia Retirement Protection Act of 1997 to include certain service longevity payments in the amount of Federal benefit payments made under such Act to officers and members of the Metropolitan Police Department.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

bill.summary: 3/28/2000--Introduced. District of Columbia Retirement Equality Act of 2000 - Amends the District of Columbia Retirement Protection Act of 1997 to require, for purposes of determining the amount of a Federal benefit payment to an officer or member of the Metropolitan Police Department, that the payment under the District Retirement Program include certain service longevity payments provided for in the Police Recruiting and Retention Enhancement Amendment Act of 1999 (such Act took effect after the freeze date).
